subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0008_01C9BA86.0EA8B050
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Exactly. And it may even be that it's both-sometimes it is us, but once in =
a while and actual entity comes through. But until I can really study it ov=
er a period time, I am just not convinced either way.

  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: Zack Widup 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Satu=
rday, April 11, 2009 1:10 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the=
 usual ghost hunter stuff.






  I tried an Ouija board once. My brother =
and I were given one by my grandmother, who found it in her attic. After as=
king many questions and getting all sorts of answers that ranged from gibbe=
rish to the totally absurd, I think we decided there was something in our j=
oint subconsciouses that was making the planchette give the answers it did.=


  That may not always be the case, though. I think if answers of some sor=
t were given involving something that no one present would have the faintes=
t idea about, and they turned out to be true or valid, then it might demons=
trate spirit communication.

  Zack


  On Fri, Apr 10, 2009 at 11:37 PM, A=
pril Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:





    Well,=
 if my husband would let me actually experiment with one, that would be the=
 first step LOL!

    But what I would try and do is get some kind of verif=
iable information from the "entity" that I contact with the board to prove =
that it is communication from an actual, intelligent being and not just my =
own motor responses making he planchette move. It would have to be informat=
ion that I have no knowledge of.

    If I could do that, and consistently,=
 then I would be comfortable saying that I am actually talking to a spirit.=


    The reason I have my doubts is that you have to be touching the planc=
hette to get it to move. If it were an actual spirit, I would think that sh=
ouldn't be necessary. We all know ghosts can a do move objects.

    But th=
is brings up another mystery - if the Ouija board is actual spirit communic=
ation, maybe there is a difference between the entities you can contact wit=
h it and your common ghost.

    April

      ----- Original Message ----- =

      From: lori bogren 
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Fr=
iday, April 10, 2009 9:50 PM
      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to=
 the usual ghost hunter stuff.


      April~
       
      Hm, finally I'm=
 intrigued again.
       
      How do you about the process?
       
     =
 ~Lori




      "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
     =
 --Anne Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 



   =
     




-----------------------------------------------------------------=
---------
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      From: april@abercrombiegh=
ostresearch.com
      Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 18:36:30 -0600
      Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.


      .


 =
     When it comes to the Ouija, I just want to study it to find out if it =
is really spirit communication, or just kinetic energy or your subconscious=
 mind moving the planchette.

      I agree that we all have the ability fo=
r extra sensory perception, just some are better at it than others. Like ru=
nning, for instance. We all can run, but some are naturally better at it. S=
till, with practice we can get better.

      But that is not my aim with t=
he Ouija.


        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: lori bogren=
 
        To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009=
 6:11 PM
        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost h=
unter stuff.


        April~
         
        You forgot yawn from boredo=
m, that's what I do.
         
        Use it, don't use it.  I don't care.=
  But why bother.  When people ask me I usually suggest that if they want t=
o communicate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yourself.  - ya=
, I'm one of those who believe anyone can.
         
        There's always=
 the question in the back of your mind whether your partner's moving it.  T=
he intentions of "what" you are talking to.  Not to mention it's too slow a=
nd limited.
         
        Besides if you take the time to develop the a=
bility you can get more texture in the information.  Asking the board "wher=
e you married?" may get you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense of a =
religious or civil ceremonhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party, or=
 whether that Being approved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a reluc=
tant union).
         
        ~Lori
